function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-compliance with COVID-19 measures due to impulsivity","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Provide targeted education and awareness on the importance of compliance with COVID-19 measures","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote counseling and support","People":"General population, individuals with high impulsivity","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Low descriptive social norms for compliance with COVID-19 measures","Impact":"Decreased adherence to COVID-19 measures and increased risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Social marketing campaigns to promote social norms for COVID-19 compliance","Technologies":"Social media platforms for targeted messaging","People":"People in social circles, communities","Owner":"Public health organizations, local government"},{"Description":"Non-normative obligation to obey the law in relation to COVID-19 regulations","Impact":"Risk of non-compliance with COVID-19 regulations and public health guidelines","Mitigation":"Legal education and awareness programs to clarify the importance of following COVID-19 regulations","Technologies":"Online legal resources and virtual seminars","People":"General population, individuals with low normative obligation to obey the law","Owner":"Legal institutions, public health organizations"}]}
